document.title: Hot Topic: Mental Evaluations for City Employees: Tennessee Enters Into a Consent Decree with the United States Department of Justice
document.abstract: The State of Tennessee has entered into a consent decree with the United States Department of Justice to settle an Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) case contesting the validity of several statutes concerning the minimum qualifications for certain public safety employees.
